Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey scored 22 points before suffering a potentially serious left leg injury
Pistons shot 64.1 percent from the field in the first half and led 65-49 at halftime
Orlando Magic made a strong rally in the third quarter, cutting the lead to 13
After Ivey's injury, the Pistons maintained a double-digit lead and eventually won by a margin of 9 points
The Pistons finished the game with a final score of 105-96
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons have won four of their last five games
Jalen Suggs led the Magic with 24 points
Cade Cunningham contributed 19 points, nine assists, and eight rebounds
Tobias Harris supplied 17 points and eight rebounds
Tim Hardaway Jr. tossed in 12 points for Detroit
